column4: I wanted to ask that why isn't librebase already preinstalled in ubuntu? and is there a way that I can install it manually?
I wanted to ask that why isn't librebase already preinstalled in ubuntu? and is there a way that I can install it manually?
there's a limited amount of software that can be included in ubuntu when you install (the install CD image is only so big), and since LibreOffice base is not as used, it doesn't make the cut, I guess
